name: Sunny Delight Margarita
preparation: Rim a chilled margarita glass with salt by rubbing a lime wedge along the rim and dipping it into coarse salt. Combine tequila, triple sec, lime juice, orange juice, and agave syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well until chilled. Strain into the prepared glass filled with fresh ice.
garnish: Lime wheel and an orange twist
backstory: The Sunny Delight Margarita is a vibrant twist on the classic margarita, designed to capture the essence of a joyful sunny day. Infused with bright citrus flavors and the warmth of tequila, it's perfect for lifting spirits and celebrating happiness. Legend has it this drink was first crafted poolside at a beach resort, becoming the go-to choice for those wanting to keep the good times rolling under the sun.
